DOC.brief_summary: To prospectively investigate effect transjugular intrahepatic portosystemic shunt ( TIPS ) oxygenation cirrhotic patient hepatopulmonary syndrome ( HPS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Transjugular Intrahepatic Portosystemic Shunt Oxygenation Cirrhotic Patients With Hepatopulmonary Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Presence cirrhosis Alveolararterial oxygen gradient ≥ 15 mm Hg ( ≥ 20 mm Hg age > 64 year ) Positive contrastenhanced echocardiography Age le 18 year Intrinsic cardiopulmonary disease Malignancy Active infection Pregnancy Previous shunt therapy Refusal participate
